pages.text: These blocks are available if <mark>Mekanism</> is installed. This includes <li>Pressurized Gas Input/Output<li>Tank Gas Intake/Outlet</>

Mekanism is a tech mod that brings low, mid, and high tier machinery to Minecraft. It adds a variety of ways to transport, generate and store energy, and to produce and process materials. For more information, check out the CurseForge page.

pages.title: Pressurized Gas Input/Output
pages.text: <li>allows gases input/output from <l>(transport/pipe)pressure pipes</l><li>will convert between gas/fluid as needed<li>to set a filter you need to use the fluid version

pages.title: Tank Gas Intake/Outlet
pages.text: <li>allows gases to be stored in <l>(transport/tank)tanks</l><li>will convert to liquid form for storage, and convert back as needed
